Package uk.ac.ed.inf

Class LngLat

java.lang.Object
uk.ac.ed.inf.LngLat
public class LngLat extends Object
this class is used to represent locations on the map as a set of co-ordinates of the form (longitude, latitude)

  • Constructor Summary

    constructor method for the LngLat objects

  • Method Details

    • getLng

      public Double getLng()
      getter method for the longitude of a LngLat object
      Returns:
      the longitude as a Double object

    • getLat

      public Double getLat()
      getter method for the latitude of a LngLat object
      Returns:
      the latitude as a Double object

    • setBaseUrl

      public static void setBaseUrl(URL baseUrl)
      setter method for the baseURL field (used to read the co-ordinates of the central area from the validated URL inputted in the command line)
      Parameters:
      baseUrl - the validated URL inputted in the command line

    • distanceTo

      public double distanceTo(LngLat location)
      computes the Pythagorean distance between the current location and a given location
      Parameters:
      location - a given location (using the (longitude, latitude) format)
      Returns:
      the Pythagorean distance between the two locations, as a double

    • closeTo

      public boolean closeTo(LngLat location)
      checks if a given location is close to the current location of the drone
      Parameters:
      location - the location to be checked (using (longitude, latitude) format)
      Returns:
      true if the given location is within the maximum acceptable distance from the current location, false otherwise

    • nextPosition

      public LngLat nextPosition(CompassDirection position)
      updates the location of the drone, once it makes a move in the given compass direction (if the drone is just hovering, then the position of the drone remains unchanged)
      Parameters:
      position - the compass direction in which the drone is headed
      Returns:
      the new location of the drone after the move is made (using the (longitude, latitude) format)

    • inCentralArea

      public boolean inCentralArea()
      checks if the current location is within the central campus area based on information from the REST server
      Returns:
      true if the point is inside the central campus area, false otherwise

    • inNoFlyZone

      public boolean inNoFlyZone()
      checks if the current location is within any of the no-fly-zones based on information from the REST server
      Returns:
      true if the current location is in a no-fly-zone, false otherwise

    • lineCutsThroughNoFlyZones

      public boolean lineCutsThroughNoFlyZones(LngLat newPosition)
      check if a line between two points cuts through any of the no-fly-zones obtained from the inputted URL
      Parameters:
      newPosition - the new point being considered as a future move
      Returns:
      true if the line cuts through a no-fly-zone, false otherwise
